name: Orb Tour (itch)
description:
Do you like open sandbox platformers? Do you like riding dragons, climbing towers, solving riddles, piloting flying saucers, finding collectibles, robots, exploring the vast reaches of space, medieval times, wintery wonderlands, dreamscapes, and more? Well then, our latest and greatest game ORB TOUR is for you.
Snowy the snowcone is an alien who has been asleep for many years. When he wakes up, his people have VANISHED! He is the last of his kind, and he needs your help to find all 30 of the missing power orbs, so he can rebuild the mothership and bring his people back, before they face extinction.

Noteworthy features:

Save Stating in Level (not for hard mode)
Custom Camera Zooming
Advanced Jump Controls
Gamepad Supported (Xbox recommended)
Unlockable Hard Mode (after you beat the game the first time, no save stating in hard mode)
Coin rush mode (for speedrunners)

SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS
    MINIMUM:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 7
    • Processor: Intel Atom
    • Memory: 128 MB RAM
    • Graphics: 128 MB
    • Storage: 300 MB available space
    RECOMMENDED:
    • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
    • OS: Windows 10
    • Processor: Intel Core I3
    • Memory: 512 MB RAM
    • Graphics: 512 MB
    • Storage: 300 MB available space
